schema.description: Schema for a screen view event

id.description: An ID from the associated screenview event.

name.description: The name of the screen viewed.

previousId.description: A screenview ID of the previous screenview.

previousName.description: The name of the previous screen.

previousType.description: The screen type of the previous screenview.

transitionType.description: The type of transition that led to the screen being viewed.

type.description: The type of screen that was viewed e.g feed / carousel.
